name: OVERLAPS
description:
The game is set in a strange mental hospital where you roam the halls to find The end. 

The game is in early development and there is plenty planned.

Storyline

The storyline has you placed as an entity wandering the halls of a mental hospital. Your objective is to find a secret room which will reveal the truth.

Planned Updates 

  • Enemy Colliders
  • More hints towards the "End room"
  • Entity animations
  • Cutscenes
